hero.title: Qarshi Smart City
hero.subtitle: City Development System
hero.description: Urban infrastructure management and quality citizen services system based on modern technologies
about.title: About Project
about.description: Qarshi Smart City is a modern digital ecosystem aimed at digitizing urban infrastructure, automating city management, and simplifying public services for citizens. The main goal of the project is to improve the quality of life in Qarshi, optimize urban governance, and create a safe, comfortable, and modern urban environment.
about.goal.desc: To create a safe, comfortable, and modern urban environment for citizens. Within the project, the city infrastructure is digitized, management processes are automated, and essential daily services are integrated into a unified system.
about.team.desc: Experienced developers, engineers, analysts, and urban management specialists are working on the Qarshi Smart City project. The team is consistently implementing modern technologies, optimizing city management, and improving the convenience and quality of services provided to citizens.
about.results.desc: As a result of implementing the Smart City project, several positive improvements are being observed in the city of Qarshi. Digitized systems are simplifying city management and increasing the efficiency of public services.
services.title: System Services
services.description: A complex of modern electronic services to simplify the lives of citizens
service.docs.detail:
Request and receive official documents online, submit applications, and track their status. The system provides templates and guidance so citizens can prepare correct paperwork and avoid delays.

- Request and download digital copies of certificates and permits
- Submit applications with attachments and monitor processing
- Receive notifications and verify document authenticity online
service.infrastructure.detail:
Access detailed information about city buildings, planning documents and construction permits. This section includes technical data, cadastral references and ongoing development plans that affect neighborhoods.

- View building records and ownership data
- Browse urban plans and development projects
- Check the status of construction permits and inspections
service.social.detail:
Information and online services for social assistance, benefits and pension-related queries. Citizens can find eligibility criteria and submit requests for support programs.

- Apply for social benefits and subsidies
- Find contact information for social service offices
- Track the status of assistance requests and appeals
service.economy.detail:
Support and information for entrepreneurs, investment opportunities and grant applications. The portal lists available incentives and procedural steps for starting or expanding a business.

- Information on business registration and licensing
- Open investment projects and tenders
- Guidance for grant applications and funding programs
service.smart.detail:
Overview of smart-city technologies, IoT deployments and monitoring solutions in the city. Learn how sensors and data platforms improve services like lighting, waste collection and traffic.

- Smart lighting zones and energy-saving initiatives
- IoT sensor networks for environmental and infrastructure monitoring
- Public dashboards and datasets for transparency
service.health.detail:
Find medical institutions, book appointments online and consult the doctors' directory. Users can check available services, opening hours and emergency contacts.

- Search hospitals, clinics and primary care centers
- Book and manage appointments with specialists
- Access health campaigns and vaccination information
service.education.detail:
Information about educational institutions, enrollment and online learning opportunities. Parents and students can find enrollment rules, schedules and available courses.

- School and kindergarten directories with contacts
- Enrollment procedures and required documents
- Links to online courses and continuing education resources
service.transport.detail:
Public transport routes, real-time vehicle tracking and fare schedules for commuters. The transport module helps plan journeys and provides live updates during disruptions.

- Route maps, stop locations and timetable lookup
- Real-time vehicle positions and arrival predictions
- Fare information, ticketing options and concession policies
service.housing.detail:
Manage housing-related matters, view and pay utility bills, and contact dispatch services. Tenants and homeowners can file service requests and receive updates from utility providers.

- View and pay utility bills online
- Report maintenance issues and track repair status
- Access housing programs and support contacts
service.water.detail:
Information on water supply, consumption control and bill payment options. Monitor your usage and learn about conservation programs and scheduled maintenance.

- Check water supply schedules and notices
- Monitor household consumption and leaks
- Pay water bills and manage account settings online
service.wifi.detail:
Locate free Wi‑Fi zones and get connection instructions and maps. The service lists hotspots in public buildings, parks and transit hubs.

- Interactive map of public Wi‑Fi coverage
- Step-by-step connection guides and troubleshooting tips
- Locations by category (parks, libraries, community centers)
service.security.detail:
City security services, CCTV monitoring and emergency response information. Find guidance on how to report incidents and what to do in emergencies.

- Information on public surveillance and safety programs
- Emergency contacts and reporting procedures
- Community safety initiatives and crime prevention tips
service.ecology.detail:
Information on green areas, environmental quality monitoring and greening programs. Residents can join tree-planting events and view air/water quality data.

- Park and green-space maps with amenities
- Environmental monitoring data and reports
- Volunteer programs for tree planting and clean-ups
service.news.detail:
Latest city news, official announcements and upcoming events calendar. Stay informed about public hearings, local projects and community activities.

- Official notices and tender announcements
- City event calendar and registration links
- Press releases and important updates from authorities
service.tax.detail:
Tools for tax calculations, paying taxes online and checking outstanding debts. The portal helps residents and businesses comply with local tax rules and deadlines.

- Tax calculators and guideline documents
- Secure online payment and invoice history
- Check liabilities and request clarifications from tax offices
service.legal.detail:
Access legal assistance, sample documents and ways to submit inquiries to authorities. This includes frequently used templates and instructions for legal procedures.

- Sample forms and legal document templates
- Online consultation and appointment booking
- Filing complaints, appeals and following up on cases
service.auto.detail:
Vehicle registration details, fines checking and parking maps. Motorists can view registration status, parking zones and traffic penalties.

- Look up vehicle registration and ownership details
- Check traffic fines and payment options
- Find public parking locations and tariffs
service.government.detail:
Contacts and online services for government offices, reception schedules and e-queue. Find office hours, responsible departments and online service links.

- Directory of government departments and contacts
- Book appointments and join e-queues online
- Access forms and guidance for public services
